text: A Few Good Men is a 1992 American military drama movie about the corruption of the US Navy in the American Naval Base of Guantanamo in Cuba and Washington, D.C.. It starred Jack Nicholson, Tom Cruise and Demi Moore. It was directed by Rob Reiner. == Other websites == * Category:1992 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies set in Cuba Category:1990s English-language movies Category:1990s legal movies Category:Movies about corruption Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Rob Reiner
title: A Few Good Men
